docstring.long_description:
Requires a CONNECTION_DS1074Z block at the start of the app to connect with
the instrument. The VISA address will then be listed under 'connection'.

This block should also work with compatible DS1000Z oscilloscopes
docstring.short_description: Turn the channels on or off for the DS1074Z oscilloscope.

parameters.name: connection
parameters.description: The VISA address (requires the CONNECTION_DS1074Z block).
